title: Bug 7785: SaveAs Forgets the file type
description: Bug 7785: SaveAs Forgets the file type. The icon has also changed from the parent javafile icon to a generic file icon.
OB:
When performing the following steps:
1) Open an existing java file
2) Modify the file, such as moving an existing class
3) Click the SaveAs icon, located next to the Save Icon
4) A dialog will appear
5) Browse for a valid container location
6) Type the filename without providing the file extension
7) Click Ok

The observed behavior is that the Navigator adds the file to the specified location, but no file extension is shown.
EB: The expected behavior is that when selecting SaveAs, the software should prompt for a file extension or automatically append the appropriate file extension based on the file type. The Navigator should display the file with the correct file icon corresponding to its file type.
SR:
To reproduce:
1) Open an existing java file
2) Modify the file
3) Click the SaveAs icon
4) Browse for a valid container location
5) Type the filename without providing the file extension
6) Click Ok
